description.value:
Source: Dragon Empires Primer pg. 29

Add the following spells to your wizard spell list at the listed spell level:

  • 1st— @UUID[Compendium.pf1.spells.54x9nw6ni4rpphcn]{keen senses},
  • 3rd— @UUID[Compendium.pf1.spells.bp1j6n5r1lsok3kf]{twilight knife}*,
  • 4th— @UUID[Compendium.pf1.spells.ni93l43asrq29ytd]{wandering star motes}*,
  • 6th— @UUID[Compendium.pf1.spells.jbqo4o2b2tmdz7wv]{true seeing},
  • 8th— @UUID[Compendium.pf1.spells.2vb5orfcy57lrfmc]{moment of prescience}.
